A female figure peers through her blindfold from the cover of this stately tome.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per day;  **Requirements** Your last action was to cast a [divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47) spell prepared from this grimoire; **Effect** The grimoire offers you a glimpse into the truth of things. [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) or [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26).
